itunes:title: Episode 401 - DB Sports Companion Show 03/25/19 - Special Guest Fitness Superstar Demi Bagby
title: Episode 401 - DB Sports Companion Show 03/25/19 - Special Guest Fitness Superstar Demi Bagby
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with fitness star Demi Bagby to chat about her overnight success.  Mat, Dan, and Ross also break down the Sweet 16, chat about Conor McGregor's surprise retirement, and pick the spreads o...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson, Mat Best, Jarred Taylor, and Dan Hollaway sit down with fitness star Demi Bagby to chat about her overnight success.  Mat, Dan, and Ross also break down the Sweet 16, chat about Conor McGregor's surprise retirement, and pick the spreads of this week's games for March Madness.  The "Fight Club Game Of The Week" involves a hand written letter.
